{"compiler":{"version":"0.8.20+commit.a1b79de6"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[],"name":"InvalidEncoding","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"InvalidMove","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"InvalidPromotion","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"InvalidSquare","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"MoveLeavesKingInCheck","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"NotYourTurn","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"PieceNotFound","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"BLACK","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"BOARD_SIZE","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"B_BISHOP","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"B_KING","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"B_KNIGHT","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"B_PAWN","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"B_QUEEN","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"B_ROOK","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"EMPTY","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"JUST_DOUBLE_MOVED_PAWN","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"KING_TO_MOVE","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"SQUARE_MASK","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"UNMOVED_KING_OR_ROOK","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"WHITE","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"W_BISHOP","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"W_KING","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"W_KNIGHT","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"W_PAWN","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"W_QUEEN","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"W_ROOK","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Uses a fixed-size 256-bit integer to represent the entire board state,      including piece positions, castling rights, en passant target, and side to move.      Encoding details: 64 squares, 4 bits per square (0=a1, 63=h8).      Piece IDs:      0: EMPTY      1: W_PAWN      2: B_PAWN      3: JUST_DOUBLE_MOVED_PAWN (Color inferred: rank 3 = White pawn on 4th, rank 4 = Black pawn on 5th)      4: W_KNIGHT      5: B_KNIGHT      6: W_BISHOP      7: B_BISHOP      8: W_ROOK (Moved or standard)      9: B_ROOK (Moved or standard)      10: W_QUEEN      11: B_QUEEN      12: UNMOVED_KING_OR_ROOK (Identity determined by initial square: e1/e8=K, a1/h1/a8/h8=R)      13: W_KING (Moved or standard)      14: B_KING (Moved or standard)      15: KING_TO_MOVE (The king whose side's turn it is)      Castling rights are implicitly determined by the presence of UNMOVED_KING_OR_ROOK (12)      on the respective king and rook starting squares (e1, a1, h1, e8, a8, h8).      En passant target square is implicitly determined by the location of      JUST_DOUBLE_MOVED_PAWN (3). Rank 3 means white pawn just moved, target square is rank 2.      Rank 4 means black pawn just moved, target square is rank 5.      Turn is determined by finding KING_TO_MOVE (15) and seeing if the other king is W_KING (13) or B_KING (14).","kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"ChessLogic Library","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"Handles the core logic for chess game state manipulation and move validation         based on a compact 256-bit encoding.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/ChessLogic.sol":"ChessLogic"},"evmVersion":"shanghai","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":10000},"remappings":[":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"src/ChessLogic.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc0b3b57d7fbf2a115cfcc9276511a422d0c5267892ccba0b5036b38d9a1eacdb","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://55b55e0d3b86f60885632f1db622e312f6164f6a76800193c3b38fde0e719f64","dweb:/ipfs/QmWDXr2SZ5JJPfj1Nq215YYcPf8jm7WigopFXGkPoVk4Jm"]}},"version":1}
